sentences.sContent: ...the planet will like be exposed to potentially catastrophic climate risks...
...with the goal of a universal and potentially legally-binding agreement reducing greenhouse gas emissions...
...is urgently needed to lower the risk of irreversible and potentially devastating effects of climate change...
...the process of urbanization will only accelerate in the decades to come — with an enormous impact on biodiversity and potentially on climate change...
...wastage of food potentially contributes to unnecessary global warming as well as inefficient resource utilisation...
...Elimination of waste alone can potentially provide over sixty percent more food for the growing world population...
...are the potentially harmful effects of goal-setting...
...Dillia realized the plan was expensive and potentially controversial...

words.tran: 潜能；可能性；[电] 电势

trans.tranOther: something that is potentially dangerous, useful etc is not dangerous etc now, but may become so in the future
